name: All the Cooks in the Kitchen
name_original: All the Cooks in the Kitchen
description: Hello, we are Hot Barber Studios and the hidden hero that we picked was the grandmother of one of our members.  She was chosen to be our hidden hero because she, like those before her and those after her, brought people together through cooking. That the recipes that had been passed down to her will be passed down again and again, connecting the generations of old and new through something that we don't often think consciously about, a meal that we share with those close to us. All the Cooks in the Kitchen was created for the Hidden Heroes Game Jam hosted by IndieCade in 2023!
